item.title: Algorithms
item.description: Algorithms About This is an unoﬃcial documentaion created for educational purposes and is not aﬃliated with oﬃcial Algorithms group(s) or company(s) nor Stack Overﬂow.

item.title: A sample algorithmic problem
item.description: The algorithmic problem Section 1.1: The problem An algorithmic problem is speciﬁed by describing the complete set of instances it must work on and of its output after running on one of these instances.

item.title: Algorithm Complexity
item.description: Algorithms and complexity Section 2.1: Big-Theta Unlike Big-O notation, which represents only upper bound of the running time for some algorithm, Big-Theta is a tight bound; both upper and lower bound.
